page.title: 16ATTITUDES TO WINGERWORTH
page.content: We asked people in Wingerworth what changes and developments they would like to see in their village. The general feeling was that things could be improved by:{ {1.}No building being allowed to take place on the {Green Belt}land,which separates Wingerworth from Chesterfield. {2.}No further{building development anywhere. {3.}A more frequent{bus service}and a Sunday service. {4.}Refusal of planning permission for a{pub on the Lido. {5.}Closing down the{Avenue Coking { Plant. } {6.}More {Childrens' play areas. {7.}A{shop}in the Allendale Road area.
